sentences.en: As the scientists conclude: "Our results expand the known metazoan bio-sphere and demonstrate that deep ecosystems are more complex than previously accepted.
sentences.cn: 科学家总结道：“我们的研究结果扩展了已知的后生生物圈的范围，并揭示出，深层生态系统比我们之前想象的要复杂。

sentences.en: Several Metazoan! I would like to ask the mountain toward the river side is what?
sentences.cn: “几位后生! 请问那座山向著大河的一面是个什麽样子? ”.

sentences.en: Since the Middle Proterozoic, metazoan trace fossils must have undergone an irreversible evolution from simple to complicated, and from lower to higher in quality.
sentences.cn: 中元古代以来后生动物遗迹的演化过程在质上经历了由简单到复杂， 由低级到高级的发展、演变过程。

trans.tran_cn: 后生动物的，多细胞动物的

trans.tran_en: any multicellular animal of the group Metazoa: includes all animals except sponges
